dct_title_s: Teotihuacan cosmic city complete guide : historical sketch, urban cosmology, mural painting, excavations, dimensions, museums, Acolman / Katherine C. Nigh.
dct_description_sm: Map shows excavated structures, unexcavated structures, murals, roads and trails, restrooms and other modern facilities. Recto: Illustrations; archaeological plans of Yayahuala, Zacuala, Tetitla. Verso: Tourist information, historical sketch and references. Walking tour of ceremonial center of Teotihuacán. North is oriented towards left of map. Varying form of name for Katherine C. Nigh: Kippy Nigh. "Sac be" [White path].
